alert.note: Alert for South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 11:34AM PST until December 27 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Siskiyou County. This includes portions of I-5 and Hwy 89 and the communities of Dunsmuir, McCloud and Mt Shasta City. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
